__e: Amelia never told you, did she?
Even... No, even if this Amelia girl isn't my niece, she might know something.
Whatever became of Amelia, she's gone. I'm sorry, but it's time to move on.
My work is very important, and Amelia is at the heart of it.
I mean, Amelia's made it very clear that she doesn't want my help, but I just--I love her, and I-I want her to know that if she needs me--
Right now, finding the girl Amelia is the only way to prove that any of this is true.
So, uh, Amelia went to go pick up the kids.
And Amelia's plan is the only one we have.
Oh yeah, is Amelia's party still going on?
Amelia tells me you are unwell.
Amelia's spoken very well of you my dear friend.
Hey, Amelia just asked if I could go to the movies with her tonight.
